channel.title: csx on Coding notes

item.title: dotnet scrips
item.description: Install dotnet script dotnet tool install -g dotnet-script Write csx script file with nuget package reference // script.csx #r "nuget:Newtonsoft.Json, 13.0.1" using Newtonsoft.Json; using Newtonsoft.Json.Linq; var args = Environment.GetCommandLineArgs(); if(args.Any(a => a == "--dry-run")) { return; } Console.WriteLine("Using Newtonsoft.Json to parse JSON."); var json = JObject.Parse(@"{ 'name': 'John', 'age': 30 }"); Console.WriteLine(json["name"]); Run script dotnet-script script.csx
